com.facebook.litho.testing.viewtree

Class ViewPredicates

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.testing.viewtree.ViewPredicates

  • public final class ViewPredicates
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of useful predicates over Android views for tests
